entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Lytton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lytton 12:54 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure: 102.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: S 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain changing to freezing rain or rain this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Temperature steady near minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or rain. Snow level lowering to 600 metres before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snow level 600 metres rising to 1300 metres in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 mm except 30 mm near Boston Bar. Wind south 20 km/h. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low zero.
